func.title: SetMeshMaterial

param.name: material
param.desc: Name of the material to set. It needs to be loaded at engine startup, i.e. it needs to be defined in a *.material file being located in an object that was loaded.

param.name: submesh
param.desc: If the mesh is composed of multiple submeshes then this parameter can be used to specify the submesh whose material is to be changed.

func.desc: Changes the material of the calling object's mesh at runtime.
